posts.post_title: T206 Kling T201 Chance/Evers- Both Sold
posts.post_content:
Cleaning up the collection a little by selling off some cards that don't fit in the direction of my collection anymore:
(Front and back scans can be seen by clicking [URL="http://s486.photobucket.com/albums/rr225/t2069bk/FOR%20SALE/"]here[/URL])

SOLD T201 Evers/Chance SGC 40 $62 SOLD
SOLD T206 John Kling SGC 10 $14 SOLD


Paypal is preferred (no fee) Shipping is $3 insured.
Edited... didn't see the shipping cost as extra so I rescind my offer.  My apologies.

I will take the T201 Mecca Chance/Evers for $62 + $3 shipping.

Please reply with payment instructions.

thanks
